title: Pushpaka Kundan Stud Earrings with Emerald Accent
materials: Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Stones. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Intricately designed floral motif with openwork detailing. Central emerald surrounded by a halo of sparkling CZ stones. Features a unique open filigree pattern, reminiscent of traditional Kundan settings, blended with modern aesthetics. Secure screw-back closure.
colors: Rich gold hue complemented by the vibrant green of the emerald and the brilliance of the white CZ stones.
occasions: Perfect for everyday wear or special occasions like weddings
or family gatherings. Suitable for both traditional attire (Saree
description: Exquisite craftsmanship showcasing the best of Hyderabadi jewelry artistry. The combination of emerald and CZ stones creates a captivating sparkle. The open design provides a modern twist on the classic kundan style, making it both timeless and contemporary. High-quality materials ensure durability and lasting beauty. The floral design symbolizes prosperity and good fortune.
